price: "Senhor nosso! Remove de nós o castigo: por certo, somos crentes!"
arabic: رَّبَّنَا ٱكۡشِفۡ عَنَّا ٱلۡعَذَابَ إِنَّا مُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: rabbanā ik'shif ʿannā al-ʿadhāba innā mu'minūna
